text: This place was soo Relaxing to be at! I discovered this after coming from the Robertson Quay side of the Alexandra PCN, if only I didn't Discover this in a 37km Walk, I definitely would come back if I lived in the South Side of Singapore!

Nice place for a walk run or chat. Canal nature and city scape all rolled into one. Nearer downtown great views and further upstream it gets quieter and a chance to walk in rainforest trees following the old rail line

Nicely landscaped park with relaxation areas and water features at the uppermost accessible point of the Singapore River. From here there are walkways on both sides of the canal and river that stretch all the way to Marina Bay. Very nice to walk in early morning or evening.

Hidden gem. Peaceful water play area (it’s like a shallow wading pool). The ground is tiled, water looks clean, two benches in the area and a shaded pavilion. Kid enjoyed walking around in the water. People jogging and cycling nearby.
I had a meeting here with my friend and went around this area then find this place! Landscape here is breath-taking, its good for thosewho want to take a stroll and unwind when feel blue!
